snippet: Industry was translated into elegy in music by the Icelandic composer Johann Johannsson at the first program of the four-night Silent Films/Live Music series.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by composer Johann Johannsson with the Wordless Music Orchestra to accompany silent film images arranged by Bill Morrison at Winter Garden.
lead_paragraph: Industry was translated into elegy in music by the Icelandic composer Johann Johannsson at the first program of the four-night Silent Films/Live Music series.

headline.seo: Johann Johannsson’s Music With Images at Winter Garden
headline.main: Acoustic and Electronic Odes to the Working Man, With Images to Match
headline.print_headline: Acoustic and Electronic Odes to the Working Man, With Images to Match
